sense.gloss: to be disconnected, to get out of place, to be off, to be out (e.g. of gear)
to miss the mark, to get it wrong (e.g. guess, expectation), to draw a blank (e.g. lottery)
to be removed, to be excluded
to be contrary to, to go against

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓がソロを↑歌↑↓うた↓うとき、↑音程↑↓おんてい↓が↑外↑↓|はず↓れる|んじゃないかって、↑手↑↓て↓に↑汗↑↓あせ↓↑握↑↓にぎ↓っちゃうよね。
sdata.e: When he gets up on stage to sing one of his out-of-tune solos, I get so nervous for him that I get sweaty palms.

sdata.j: いやぁ！あきちゃんのチャイナ、↑可愛↑↓かわい↓かった。あぶなく、↑理性↑↓りせい↓のタガが↑外↑↓|はず↓れる|とこだった。
sdata.e: Oh man! Aki in a china dress was so cute. I almost lost it then.

sdata.j: ↑普段↑↓ふだん↓はとてもおとなしいナイスガイだが、↑理性↑↓りせい↓のタガが|はずれる|と↑人格↑↓じんかく↓が↑豹変↑↓ひょうへん↓する↑二↑↓に↓↑重↑↓じゅう↓↑人格↑↓じんかく↓。
sdata.e: He's got a dual personality - usually a quiet "nice guy" type, but when he flips, his character changes.

sdata.j: 「↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑歌↑↓うた↓うと、↑時々↑↓ときどき↓↑音↑↓おと↓が↑外↑↓|はず↓れる|んだよね」「そういうのを、↑音痴↑↓おんち↓って↑言↑↓い↓うんだよ」
sdata.e: When I sing, sometimes I get off-pitch. "That's what we call 'being tone deaf'".
